author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds alignment code for PPS, following the strategy presented in [AlCaDB meeting on 28 Sep](https://indico.cern.ch/event/959393/). In particular, this PR contains an implementation of the "global" alignment (the "relative" alignment is included in #31629). A follow up of this PR is foreseen, focusing on the inclusion of the global alignment in the PCL.

#### PR validation:

- Tests are included in the test directory.
- More tests can be found in [pps-alignment-data repository](https://github.com/CTPPS/pps-alignment-data).
- Tests for different years, fills, xangles, beta have been run, and the results are compatible with the alignment which is now uploaded to the offline DB and used for reconstruction.
title: PPS: global alignment
